Title: PhotoSort
Description: PhotoSort is a simple utility for sorting images when you upload from cameras in categories sub-directories. It's developed in C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

PhotoSort is a simple utility for sorting images when you upload from cameras in categories sub-directories. It's developed in C# and WPF.

Features

  • Compare multiple photos in a single window
  • Evaluation photo potential in black and white
  • Sort photo in categories sub-directories
  • Easy photo orientation function
  • Black and White colors transformation
  • Load and save project
  • Show exif information
